ygData.subject: RE: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From what I found last night, it was useless. ... This is exactly what I found as well. My most effective attack strategy was to constantly bellow because
ygData.messageBody:
> Does Elemental Rhythms really *do* anything to
> their attacks?

From what I found last night, it was useless.

> Mobs have so many hp you wind up taking a ridiculous
> amount of damage from the shields alone.

This is exactly what I found as well. My most effective
attack strategy was to constantly bellow because I didn't
take damage when I hit them with a bellow. It was a pain
free 9 points of damage each time.

I ended up fighting a lot of rock dervishes and a few
goblins (man they group up quick) while I was there.
